Welcome

Welcome to the school where high expectations in terms of learning and behaviour ensure that girls flourish.

We are now in our fantanstic new building with facilties which are second to none, providing an exceptional learning environment. This can only lead to even greater achievements. We are a school where young women achieve academic excellence, where they are encouraged to participate and excel in artistic and sporting events...

Jack Petchey Foundation ceremony

The following award winners were presented with their Jack Petchey Islington Award for their excellence in achievement and leadership.

    • Posted on: 28/02/2017

    Rock Challenge Success

    On Wednesday 22nd February, the 2017 Rock Challenge team travelled to Stevenage to compete in the event and ranked 3rd overall! We also won awards for excellence in the following categories: soundtrack, concept, visual enhancement, video performance and entertainment...
    Additionally, we were awarded special recognition for cultural and educational...
